$schema.description: Path to the JSON schema file that will be used for configuration validation
$schema.markdownDescription: Path to the JSON schema file that will be used for configuration validation

bracketSpacing.description: Whether to add spaces between brackets in export statements
bracketSpacing.markdownDescription: Whether to add spaces between brackets in export statements

singleQuote.description: Whether to use single quotes instead of double quotes for exports
singleQuote.markdownDescription: Whether to use single quotes instead of double quotes for exports

semi.description: Whether to append semicolons to export statements
semi.markdownDescription: Whether to append semicolons to export statements

insertFinalNewline.description: Whether to append a newline character at the end of generated files
insertFinalNewline.markdownDescription: Whether to append a newline character at the end of generated files

root.description: Root directory to start from (support glob pattern)
root.markdownDescription: Root directory to start from (support glob pattern)

name.description: Name of the index file (e.g. index.ts or some/path/index.ts)
name.markdownDescription: Name of the index file (e.g. index.ts or some/path/index.ts)

include.description: Files to include in the barrel (supports glob patterns)
include.markdownDescription: Files to include in the barrel (supports glob patterns)

exclude.description: Files to exclude from the barrel (supports glob patterns)
exclude.markdownDescription: Files to exclude from the barrel (supports glob patterns)

additionalProperties.description: String or regular expression pattern to find in export paths (e.g. "\\.ts$", "my-custom-export-path.ts")
additionalProperties.markdownDescription: String or regular expression pattern to find in export paths (e.g. "\\.ts$", "my-custom-export-path.ts")

replace.description: String or regular expression patterns to find and replace in export paths (e.g. {"\\.ts$": "", "my-custom-export-path.ts": "my-path.ts"})
replace.markdownDescription: String or regular expression patterns to find and replace in export paths (e.g. {"\\.ts$": "", "my-custom-export-path.ts": "my-path.ts"})

additionalProperties.description: Glob pattern exports file with string or regular expression patterns. Supports variables: $filename (filename without extension) and $exportName (actual default export name). Example: "**\/*service.ts": ["* as lib", "/(.+)Config$/ as $1LibConfig", "default as $filename", "default as $exportName"]
additionalProperties.markdownDescription:
Glob pattern exports file with string or regular expression patterns

Supports variables:
- `$filename` - filename without extension
- `$exportName` - actual default export name

Example: `"**\/*service.ts": ["* as lib", "/(.+)Config$/ as $1LibConfig", "default as $filename", "default as $exportName"]`

exports.description: Configuration for exports in barrel files
exports.markdownDescription: Configuration for exports in barrel files
